attributes.action: encourage or force BT to eliminate broadband holes or "not-spots"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To give incentives to BT to invest in the telephone infrastructure, so that wherever possible, rather than only where profitable, rural locations without ADSL broadband service can receive it, or a cheap reliable alternative.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
